job.title: Senior Software Engineer
job.description: <strong><u>Responsibilities Include<br><br></u></strong>Position Summary... What you'll do...<br><ul><li>Primarily responsible for delivering high quality technical designs and code for the product requirements in a fast-paced agile scrum environment.</li><li>Lead and participate in small to medium-scale projects by reviewing project requirements; translating requirements into technical solutions; gathering requested information (for example, design documents, product requirements, wire frames); writing and developing code; conducting unit testing; communicating status and issues to team members and stakeholders; collaborating with project team and cross functional teams; troubleshooting open issues and bug-fixes; ensuring on-time delivery and hand-offs; interacting with project manager to provide input on project plan; and providing leadership to the project team..</li><li>Strive for continuous improvement in efficiency.</li><li>Troubleshoot business and production issues by gathering information (for example, issue, impact, criticality, possible root cause); engaging support teams to assist in the resolution of issues; formulating an action plan; performing actions as designated in the plan; interpreting the results to determine further action; performs root cause analysis to prevent future occurrence of issues; and completing online documentation.</li><li>Provide support to the business by responding to user's questions, concerns, and issues (for example, technical feasibility, implementation strategies); identifying short- and long-term solutions; facilitating resolutions; and leading cross-functional partnership.<br></li></ul><strong><u>About You<br><br></u></strong>You have and can implement big ideas with a positive attitude. You want to be a part of the team to disrupt this industry and you have these main skills:<br><ul><li>Must have strong knowledge &amp; hands-on experience building React Native apps (on Android devices).</li><li>Experience building customizable, reusable and dynamic components using ReactJS, React Hooks, Redux, JavaScript, ES6, Typescript, HTML, CSS and NodeJS.</li><li>Ability to build products with focus on testability, someone who loves test coverage (well versed with using Jest and mocking frameworks).</li><li>Experience in automation testing using tools such as Detox.</li><li>Experience in implementing UI analytics to report customer behavior and improve UI accordingly.</li><li>Experience with project build with CICD pipelines through Jenkins.</li><li>Strong knowledge of data structures and algorithms.</li><li>A disciplined approach to development, code review, testing, documentation and code structure in a team environment.</li><li>A constant desire to improve, learn more and take things to the next level and a passion for adopting the latest industry best practices.</li><li>Experience with monitoring tools such as Dynatrace, Splunk, Grafana.</li><li>Native iOS or Android experience is a plus.<br></li></ul>Nice to Have<br><ul><li>Experience with Cloud technologies (Azure preferred) &amp; Kubernetes.</li><li>Experience with GraphQL &amp; NextJS.</li></ul> Minimum Qualifications...<br><br><em><em>Outlined below are the required minimum qualifications for this position. If none are listed, there are no minimum qualifications. <br><br></em></em>Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science and 3 years’ experience in software engineering or related field OR 5 years’ experience in software<br><br><strong><u>Engineering Or Related Field. Preferred Qualifications...<br><br></u></strong><em><em>Outlined below are the optional preferred qualifications for this position. If none are listed, there are no preferred qualifications. <br><br></em></em>Master’s degree in Computer Science or related field and 2 years' experience in software engineering or related field Primary Location...10790 PARKRIDGE DR. SUITE 200, RESTON, VA 20191, United States of America
